info.name: Aurora Hotel Management System
info.description:
Comprehensive API Testing Collection for Aurora Hotel System

## Test Flow
1. **Authentication** - Login and get tokens
2. **User Management** - Register and manage users
3. **Branch Management** - Create and manage hotel branches
4. **Amenity Management** - Manage hotel amenities (WiFi, TV, etc.)
5. **Facility Management** - Manage branch facilities (Pool, Gym, Spa)
6. **Room Type Management** - Configure room types
7. **Room Management** - Manage individual rooms
8. **Service Management** - Hotel services (Laundry, Room service, etc.)
9. **Promotion Management** - Discounts and promotions
10. **Booking Management** - Room bookings
11. **Booking Room** - Booking-Room relationship
12. **Service Booking** - Service bookings for guests
13. **Payment Management** - Process payments
14. **Role & Permission** - Manage access control
15. **Review & Rating** - Customer reviews and ratings
16. **RAG (AI Chat)** - AI-powered chat using hotel knowledge base
17. **Document Management** - Upload, manage, and download documents

## Authentication
All endpoints (except register and login) require Bearer token authentication.

## Default Users
- **Admin**: username=`admin`, password=`Admin@123`
- **Manager**: username=`manager`, password=`Manager@123`
- **Staff**: username=`staff`, password=`Staff@123`
- **Customer**: username=`customer`, password=`Customer@123`

## New Features
- **RAG AI Chat**: Intelligent responses using retrieval augmented generation
- **Document Management**: Full CRUD operations for document handling
